basic.description:
Intermediate study of thematic and stylistic trends in recent European cinema, with reference to social and political changes.
NOTE    Offered only at the Bader International Study Centre, Herstmonceux.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Comparative Contemporary Film in Europe

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
